compatibility.notes: OSET-PL-2.1 allows for linking with other licenses that are permissive in nature. However, any modifications to the OSET-PL-2.1 licensed code must remain under the same license.

key_requirements: Accept the terms of the license to use the covered software.
Provide attribution to the original contributors.
Ensure that any modifications are clearly stated.
license.name: OSET-PL-2.1
obligations: Must include a copy of the license when distributing the software.
Must include a notice of any modifications made to the original software.
Must disclose the source code when distributing the software in executable form.
